name: category
desc: (Optional) When set: will select the latest poll from the given category (id)
desc_trans: (Optional) When set: will select the latest poll from the given category (id)

name: resultLinkVar
desc: (Optional) when using resultResource, this is the paramatername the snippet is looking for
desc_trans: (Optional) when using resultResource, this is the paramatername the snippet is looking for

name: resultResource
desc: (Optional) when set to a resource id, this resource will be used to show the poll results
desc_trans: (Optional) when set to a resource id, this resource will be used to show the poll results

name: showHidden
desc: (Opt) will show hidden polls too! (default set to false)
desc_trans: (Opt) will show hidden polls too! (default set to false)

name: sortby
desc: To sort the result by a specified fieldname
desc_trans: To sort the result by a specified fieldname

name: sortdir
desc: To sort the result ascending or descending. Default set to DESC
desc_trans: To sort the result ascending or descending. Default set to DESC

name: tpl
desc: The main result template for the latest poll view
desc_trans: The main result template for the latest poll view

name: tplAnswer
desc: The result template for the answers inside the outer view
desc_trans: The result template for the answers inside the outer view

name: tplOuter
desc: (Opt) an optional outer template could be set to surround the output
desc_trans: (Opt) an optional outer template could be set to surround the output

name: unpubOnly
desc: To show unpublished polls only. Default set to false.
desc_trans: To show unpublished polls only. Default set to false.
